name: The Key Scientist
description:
2h15 to complete. Entry for TriJam 161
-- Controls --
Use the arrows to move

When you are under one of the vials it will tell you which key to press to empty it.

Do not let the vials overflow.

-- Ressources & Software used --
Engine: Godot

Pixel art made with Pixelorama

Music made with Ableton and Magical8Bit Plugin

Sound effects from ProSound Collection / Retro

Code: https://github.com/richardbonneau/trijam-169-thekey-scientist
